Question
========
  
A main effect in a factorial design


  
Answerlist
----------
* Refers to any F-ratio that is significant in the ANOVA
* Occurs when differences are found for the different levels of an independent variable
* Occurs when the effect of one independent variable depends on the level of another independent variable
* Is determined by calculating the row mean instead of the column mean


Solution
========
  
A main effect in a factorial design occurs when differences are found for the different levels of an independent variable
